content: Hi, I'm BoBo. Nice to meet you.
it's good to see you here
Yay! BoBo happy to see you too, ZZ!
BoBo feels fuzzy wuzzy warm! Hug back ZZ!
BoBo sad, come back soon, ZZ.
BoBo feel loved! Thank you, ZZ!
whad do you do when you are lonley?
BoBo look for ZZ. Wait for hug.
Yes, BoBo get tired. Need nap sometimes.
